title: thesis type thoughts?? please your thoughts
content: If you had to pick a typeface for the body copy of your thesis what would it be?
author: goz

comments.content:
Sorry should of mentioned.

Thesis is on Branding and sponsorship within Formula One and i'm studying graphic design.

Thanks for any help

Put "squarish serif" into MyFonts.

BTW make sure you credit Typophile for helping you.

hhp

Thanks for the reply, hum looks plausible.....
